littlehexxers.page.spells.title: Little Hexxers Spells
littlehexxers.page.mark_entity.summary: Marks an entity with a glowing effect for a specified duration. Takes an entity, duration in seconds, visibility boolean, and an optional number.
littlehexxers.page.unmark_entity.summary: Removes the glowing effect from a marked entity. Takes an entity as input.
littlehexxers.page.potion_to_item.0: Additional utility spell for potion conversion.
